pls read!!

all my songs are free to download, but if you want to support me you can do so with the payment links on listen.html, or by buying my records on bandcamp.

if you do not plan to purchase the songs, i would really appreciate it if you would get on my mailing list and/or follow me on spotify, soundcloud, and bandcamp so that i can reach a greater audience with future releases. :)
